head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BROWN, CHARLES L.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BROWN, CHARLES L.

block.p: BROWN-Charles L., on May 30, 2000. Former accountant with American Airlines. Beloved husband of the late Margaret P. (nee Meehan). Loving father of Chip, Brian, Peter, Bruce, Rosemary Ryan and the late Gregory. Dear brother-in-law of Mary V. Meehan. Proud grandfather of nine loving grandchildren. Visitation Thursday 2-4 and 7-9PM at Clavin Funeral Home, 7722 4th Ave. Brooklyn, NY. Mass of Christian Burial Friday 10AM, St. Andrews.
